duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead, coach, and develop a team of Sales Associates to achieve sales and customer service targets.
Create and execute an agile business plan to recruit and retain customers through strategic targeting and in-store events.
Manage inventory, facilities, and cash reconciliation for retail operations.
Set sales and customer service targets, analyze sales, and schedule staff.
Create and execute in-store events to drive customer engagement.
Work retail hours in a fast-paced environment, including days, nights, weekends, and special events.

education_certification.credential: Proven retail management/assistant retail management experience preferably within cosmetics
